LanguageData.SewageSludgeComposting.label: Sewage Sludge Composting
LanguageData.SewageSludgeComposting.description: When properly treated and processed, sewage sludge becomes biosolids that offer a small boost to terrain fertility, useful for harsh environments with limited space to grow. Biosolids also produce a large boost to the fertility of sand which can make it fertile when combined with irrigation.
LanguageData.MultiSplitAirCon.label: Multi-Split Air Conditioning
LanguageData.MultiSplitAirCon.description: Build multi-split air conditioning systems with outdoor units piped to indoor units and freezers.
LanguageData.Plumbing.label: Fontanería
LanguageData.Plumbing.description: Use tuberías, accesorios de plomería, tanques de almacenamiento y otros aparatos para proporcionar calefacción, eliminación de desechos y agua potable.
LanguageData.LogBoilers.label: Heating
LanguageData.LogBoilers.description: Build log boilers which can be used to heat rooms and placed adjacent to baths to heat bathwater.
LanguageData.CentralHeating.label: Central Heating
LanguageData.CentralHeating.description: Build central heating systems with radiators, hot water tanks, boilers and thermostats.
LanguageData.ModernFixtures.label: Modern Bathroom Fixtures
LanguageData.ModernFixtures.description: Build modern style bathroom fixtures like toilets and showers.
LanguageData.ElectricPumps.label: Electric Pumps
LanguageData.ElectricPumps.description: Powered water pumps for pressurised continuous water pumping.
LanguageData.AdvancedShowers.label: Duchas motorizadas
LanguageData.AdvancedShowers.description: Construya duchas motorizadas que reduzcan a la mitad el tiempo que pasa duchándose y mejoren el confort, pero que usen el doble de agua.
LanguageData.AdvancedToilets.label: Inodoros Avanzados
LanguageData.AdvancedToilets.description: Construir inodoros eléctricos avanzados que usen menos agua por descarga y proporcionen más comodidad.
LanguageData.HotTubs.label: Jacuzzis
LanguageData.HotTubs.description: Construir jacuzzis que puedan ser utilizados para la hidroterapia, la relajación y el placer.
LanguageData.LargeWaterPumps.label: Industrial Scale Pumps
LanguageData.LargeWaterPumps.description: Build industrial scale water pumps and storage tanks.
LanguageData.DeepWells.label: Deep Wells
LanguageData.DeepWells.description: Drill deeper wells to access a much larger area of ground water.
LanguageData.WashingMachines.label: Washing machines
LanguageData.WashingMachines.description: Build washing machines that can wash clothes so well that you couldn't even tell someone died wearing it!.
LanguageData.WaterFiltration.label: Filtración de agua
LanguageData.WaterFiltration.description: Construir sistemas de filtración de agua para mejorar la calidad del agua y prevenir enfermedades.
LanguageData.SepticTanks.label: Septic Tanks
LanguageData.SepticTanks.description: Build septic tanks which accumulate sewage and provide moderate treatment of sewage.
LanguageData.SewageTreatment.label: Tratamiento de aguas residuales
LanguageData.SewageTreatment.description: Construir plantas de tratamiento de aguas residuales para convertir lentamente las aguas residuales en agua potable.
LanguageData.SwimmingPools.label: Swimming Pools
LanguageData.Irrigation.label: Riego
LanguageData.Irrigation.description: Construir torres de agua mucho más grandes y aspersores que puedan regar el suelo para mejorar la fertilidad.
LanguageData.FireSuppression.label: Fire Suppression
LanguageData.FireSuppression.description: Build sprinklers that when activated can suppress fires.
